about_the_game:
In a world ruled by the dead you are destined to defend the people of Sayfield. Make the strongest defense line from a combination of Epic Towers, Tactial Powers and your Shooting Skills. Fight in Dust Storms, Rainy Nights and more unqiue playing arenas! Get ready to save the humanity at all cost!





Choose the best combination among 8 Unique Towers and Upgrade them for maximum power. Discover every one of the towers and their specialties.
From the scorching Sun tower to the fastest Machine Gun in Sayfield!





The idea of placing towers is awesome but what if you can directly target the scary zombies yourself?
Choose your guns from the trusty revolver to disc launcher and try to eliminate as many zombies as you can before they destroy your base!





Alongside unique towers and a controllable first person shooting system, there are also Tactical Powers that can assist you in the battle!
11 special tactical powers, each best for a specific situation! Make sure to use them all so you know what fits the best in your arsenal!

Key Features:


-Epic Intense Defense Battles
-A controllable first person shooter in a tower defense
-Unique towers and upgrades
-Tactical powers to assist you in the battle
-Fast and intense gameplay
-Three completely unique safe zones to play with a fresh game experience
-Different weather conditions: Dust storm, snow blizzard and rainy night
-Intense boss fights
-Conquer all sixty levels in three different safe zones each with unique challenges
-Switchable air and land targeting mechanic for every tower
-Strategy in utilizing towers and tactical powers
-Safe zones each with unique scene interactives

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Quad core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 6 Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1050ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: A tower defense game with a twist of first-person shooter action! Sayfield Defense sets place in a post apocalyptic world! Defend your base from hordes of zombies in intense battles through dust storms, freezing nights and more. Are you ready to lead the charge and save the future of mankind?''

English*, German, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Persian, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
